New Records: The Yankees scored 11 runs in the game, their highest total in the postseason this year.
Anthony Volpe hit a grand slam in the third inning, marking a significant achievement for the Yankees.
Key Match Events: Volpe's grand slam off Daniel Hudson with two outs in the third inning was the turning point for the Yankees.
The Dodgers' decision to use their bullpen early led to their loss and allowed the Yankees to take control of the game.
Post-Match Reflections: Dodgers manager Dave Roberts acknowledged the loss and discussed the impact of their bullpen usage in the game.
